tags: pretty sure everyones forgotten abt that interaction at this point but its rlly funny to me still
summary: sjkdfjsjfkdl i just remembered the other day, when me and a couple other people had to come to school in the evening for a thing...
body:
sjkdfjsjfkdl i just remembered the other day, when me and a couple other people had to come to school in the evening for a thing thatll take too long to describe, everyone was talking about how much they dont want to be there, how they wanted to “go out” tonight or something, and i was like ‘yeah i’d much prefer to not be here too’

and i guess in some attempt to jokingly mock me, one person said ‘oh, what would you be doing tonight? watching dungeons and dragons?’

and i was like

yeah

critical role is live streaming right at this current second’

that is exactly what i would be doing

and the person who said that was like that was a joke what the hell. it was rlly funny

summary: See What’s Mine and Take it
title: See What’s Mine and Take it
body:
A playlist for my favorite goblin

Listen on 8tracks

Cover art Credit: reytatouille

Caleb * Beau * Fjord * Jester * Mollymauk * Yasha * Caduceus * M9

Tracklist below the cut

The Lion’s Roar - First Aid Kit

And I’m a goddamn coward, but then so are you / And the lion’s roar, the lion’s roar / Has me evading and hollering for you / And I never really knew what do do

Emperor’s New Clothes - Panic! at the Disco

I’m taking back the crown / I’m all dressed up and naked / I see what’s mine and take it / (Finders keepers, losers weepers)

Queen of the Lot - The Spring Standards

Why not have it all? / You’ve every right to take what’s not tied down / You’ve earned your spot / As Queen of the lot / So take the cake / And choke your winnings down / before I steal your crown

Anywhere on this Road - Lhasa de Sela

I live in this country now/ I’m called by this name / I speak this language / It’s not quite the same

I Found - Amber Run

And I’ll use you as a makeshift gauge / Of how much to give and how much to take / I’ll use you as a warning sign / That if you talk enough sense then you’ll lose your mind / And I found love where it wasn’t supposed to be / Right in front of me
Both of Us - B.o.B. ft Taylor Swift

I wish I was strong enough to lift not one but both of us / Some day I will be strong enough to lift not one but both of us / I can feel your pain, I can feel your struggle / You just wanna live, been everything so low / That you can could drown in a puddle / That’s why I gotta hold us up

Mess is Mine - Vance Joy

Well hold on, my darling / This mess was yours, / Now your mess is mine

King and Lionheart - Of Monsters and Men

Howling ghost they reappear / In mountains that are stacked with fear / But you’re a king and I’m a lion-heart

Brave - Sara Bareilles

Everybody’s been there, everybody’s been stared down / By the enemy / Fallen for the fear and done some disappearing / Bow down to the mighty / Don’t run, stop holding your tongue / Maybe there’s a way out of the cage where you live / Maybe one of these days you can let the light in / Show me how big your brave is
body_abstract:
A playlist for my favorite goblin

Listen on 8tracks

Cover art Credit: reytatouille

Caleb * Beau * Fjord * Jester * Mollymauk * Yasha * Caduceus * M9

Tracklist below the cut

blog.name: twinvax
blog.description: I write and reblog things for my fandoms. Main focus Critical Role. Feel free to send me asks or general headcanons about characters! I have a critical role rp blog! made and role played for Yeza the halfling (chemistyeza.tumblr.com). Asks open!

summary: Rewrite the Stars - Chapter 8 - someone_who_believed - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
title: Rewrite the Stars - Chapter 8 - someone_who_believed - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
“Do you want the bullshit answer or the truth?”

“Isn’t it always a little bit of both with you?”

Caleb can feel Mollymauk’s body shake as he laughs. “Maybe so, Mr. Widogast, maybe so.” Clearing his throat, Mollymauk looks down at his own arm. “What it boils down to is that I like them. They’re all pretty and I liked that all of them supposedly have some sort of deeper meaning behind them.”

“Supposedly,” Caleb mimics Mollymauk’s accent horribly on purpose. “Meaning you have no idea what any of these flowers mean despite them being permanently etched onto your body now.”

Mollymauk clicks his tongue. “You make it sound ridiculous when you put it that way. Who cares what they’re supposed to mean when all that really matters is what they mean to me?

Mollymauk clicks his tongue. “You make it sound ridiculous when you put it that way. Who cares what they’re supposed to mean when all that really matters is what they mean to me?

title: CR Art Discord

blog.name: bixbiboom
blog.title: I myself am also Enchanter Pumat Sol
blog.description:
Bixbi, older than you.

Fat queer of indeterminate origin.

Possibly a lesser demon.

Hellenist serving Hestia, Hermes and Chiron.

Critical Role has taken over my life and my blog.

Taliesin Jaffe is my boyfriend.

I love you.

#eyesnevershut
